nodes.text: Trivak Ninegun was an individual who led the recolonization of the planet Vaklin, located in the Trailing Sectors of the Inner Rim. After Ninegun's recolonization, the planet produced large numbers of Force-sensitive children who were recruited into the Jedi Order, with the planet's general population becoming largely pro-Jedi. Imperial Security Bureau Major Oniye Namada mentioned Ninegun in a report she wrote in 19 BBY detailing the Vaklin insurgency, titled I-1807-VAK.

Trivak Ninegun was first mentioned in Purge – The Tyrant's Fist 2, a comic book written by Alexander Freed and released in 2013 as part of the Star Wars: Purge series. The book does not make clear what era Ninegun lived in or what the individual's species or gender was.
